description:
Your lightweight step counting buddy

Stepsy is perfect for anyone who wants a simple, private way to track daily steps without unnecessary bloat. It’s a lightweight, battery-friendly Android app that uses your phone’s built-in sensors. It prioritizes simplicity, privacy, and full offline data storage.

Stay active, monitor your progress, and hit your fitness goals — all through a clean, minimal interface with near-zero battery impact.

  • Automatically calculate distance and calories burned based on your height and weight
  • View your activity trends with dynamic, interactive charts
  • Export your data as a CSV for backup or analysis
  • Use the home screen and lockscreen widgets to keep your step count front and center
